answerText: Lake Tahoe[10] Lake Tahoe is just south of this second largest city in Nevada, behind Las Vegas. It is known as the Biggest Little City in the World.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Virginia + Dartmouth | 14 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Popular ski areas surrounding this lake include Squaw Valley and Heavenly Mountain. For 10 points each [10] Name this lake which drains through the Truckee River and which is just west of Carson City.
